title: Tata Power-DDL, Nissin Electric working on micro substation with power voltage transformer project
description: Tata Power-DDL and Nissin Electric will launch a demonstration project to supply electricity from India's first micro substation with power voltage transformer. The project aims to provide stable and cost-effective power to remote areas without a power grid, using a 100-kVA installation that converts high-voltage power to low-voltage residential supply.
